pages.text: $(li)The Red Mushroom is a fungus that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/mushroom/mushroom_fields)Mushroom Fields$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/giant_taiga)Giant Taigas$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/taiga)Taigas$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_taiga)Snowy Taigas$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/taiga_mountains)Taiga Mountains$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/maple_forest)Maple Forests$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/pumpkin_fields)Pumpkin Fields$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/swamp/swamp)Swamps$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can feed a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/mungus)Mungus$(/l) with this item to make Red Mushrooms grow on its body.

$(li)It can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:perks/natures_compass)Nature's Compass$(/l), $(l)Potato Soup$(), $(l)Mushroom Stew$(), $(l)Rabbit Stew$(), $(l)Paper Wall$(), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/paper)Paper$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/charm/lanterns)Lanterns$(/l), $(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/carpenter)Carpenters$(/l) will exchange your Brown Mushrooms by $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/seed_pouch)Seed Pouch$(/l). and a $(l)Suspicious Stew$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/carpenter)Carpenters$(/l) will exchange your Red Mushrooms by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).
